{"step_by_step_thinking": "This question is asking whether performance in earlier stages of medical education can predict performance in later stages. It is generally accepted that performance in earlier stages of education can be indicative of later performance, as it reflects the student's understanding, skills, and work ethic. However, it's important to note that this is not always the case, as many factors can influence a student's performance at different stages of their education.
